about_the_game:
Thanks to Elon Musk's Brain-Computer Interface technology, perhaps we can upload our consciousness and become cyber beings when we age.

Do the game characters we kill in games also possess their own cyber lives?

Will killing them bring us cyber karma?

Play cyber beads to eliminate game karma!

It will also bring you better luck and make it easier to obtain rare rewards in other games.

Zen is the core resource in ZEN&.

The more Zen you gain, the more you can change your mindset.

You'll witness the withering and flourishing of plants, the transformation of mountains and stones.

In the end, you will find your inner peace.

In China, people use plants beads to make pray beads.

Most buyers are not Buddhists, but buying to collect. The market size of prayer beads has reached at least billions of dollars.

You'll become familiar with over ten materials for beads, such as moon and star beads, phoenix-eye beads, vajra beads, etc.(in the initial version, we'll only offer moon and star bodhi seeds).

In the game, the time you spend on the beads will change the appearance of the beads from ordinary to jade-like, which the Chinese call Baojiang.

This spiritual meditation is not boring or mechanical. We creat 300+ Zen stories in ZEN&. Hope you like them.
